items.title: Figure Drawing From Life Using The Reilly Technique.
items.headline: Learn to draw the figure from life in less than 45 minutes.
objectives_summary: Learn to draw from life using a modified gesture (Reilly) approach.
Also, this will teach an understanding of how to approach drawing from a structured format.
